text: Tarapara yakhana tara tadera iddatakale paumche yaya takhana haya tadera rekhe debe bhalabhabe athaba tadera charachari kare debe bhalabhabe, ara tomadera madhye theke du'ijana n'yayaparayana lokake saksi karo, ara tomara allah‌ra uddesye saksya kayema karabe. E'ibhabe'i era dbara take upadesa de'oya hacche ye allah‌te o akheratera dine bisbasa kare. Ara ye ke'u allah‌ke bhaya-bhakti kare tara jan'ya tini berubara patha kare dena.
